title: Trine 3: The Artifacts of Power (2.2.0.5) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_trine_3_the_artifacts_of_power_2.2.0.5.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Change log:
Update 1.10 build 3080 (05 November 2015)
Added the Linux version of Trine 3: The Artifacts of Power.
Levels
Added a new level "The Quest for Cake" !
Added similar checkpoint logic to Lost Pages levels than Tutorial levels have, now you can die during the level and continue without restarting the whole level
Fixed and tweaked lots of small gameplay issues in all levels
Fixed some broken AI navigation mesh data in various levels
Gameplay
Amadeus (Wizard) accurate or companion levitation cannot be started while not on ground ("the Wizard box exploit")
Fixed issue where Amadeus (Wizard) could pick up objects with zero input
Fixed issue where wallhead projectiles cut the Zoya's grappling hook
Fixed issue where ALT+TAB could result missing characters
Tweaked new level indicator in playable map scene
Tweaked Trineangles visual deletion to be instant instead of delayed
Player characters
Fixed issue where crouching could cause movement stuck
Tweaked player character skills
Tweaked player wall jumping so that exploiting wouldn't occur
Tweaked surface jumps from water (now instant, not delayed)
Technical
Re-built the game data due to some engine level changes which leads to big update
Fixed crash issues which could occur when changing characters (rapidly)
Fixed rare crash issues with physics objects (when physics contact happened)
Fixed rare crash issue which could occur when levitating objects with Amadeus (Wizard)
Fixed memory leak issues with AI navigation mesh data
Optimizations
Added (minor) optimizations all over the gameplay and engine logic while working on other platforms :)
Batched model particles to single draw call
Optimized AI navigation mesh data sizes
Online multiplayer
Added a failsafe logic if online multiplayer game server doesn't respond so that game wouldn't jam into "Refreshing..." window
Fixed issue where game used Local Area Network (LAN) for online games if GOG login failed
Rendering
Fixed sway which was randomly disabled sometimes
GUI
Fixed loading screen glitching when changing save slots or deleting them
Fixed missing character when deleting a save slot
Fixed save slot menu issues (correct localization)
Fixed duplicate data in level's checkpoint menu
Fixed game console issues (console can be opened from F8 button)
Fixed incorrect tooltips when using user binds
Tweaked level's checkpoint menu (automatically scale to correct size)
Cinematics
Fixed minor issues with the intro cinematic (polished scene, no more holes in the geometry, no more characters running through the walls etc.)
Input
Added hardware cursor to be in use by default (can be changed from options.txt, InputModule::OSCursorVisible)
Fixed console (F8) arrow key issues (left/right
Fixed some rare double input issues with backspace button and input in general)
Fixed cursor hide/show issues when using ALT+TAB
Fixed cursor hide/show issues in general
Fixed input disabling/enabling issues during cinematics
Fixed Nvidia Shield Controller issues
Achievements
Fixed issue where Trineangle related achievements were only unlocked on level exit, now they are unlocked when last one is collected in a level
Fixed incorrectly awarded achievements in online multiplayer game
Stereo 3D
Fixed Stereo 3D feature available pop up which was missing
Fixed Trine 3: The Artifacts of Power main menu logo which stuck on screen when Stereo 3D was enabled
Save & Load
Fixed end boss issues if player quit the game during the end boss and resumed game later on
Localization
Added Finnish text localization!
Fixed issue where missing localization caused game to be unplayable
Fixed missing Turkish characters
Effects
Fixed infinite looping effects when owner object had been already deleted
Audio
Fixed missing speeches in various levels for all languages
PhysX
Re-built PhysX 3.3.3 libraries to fix rare physics issues
Launcher
Fixed issues where some of the text didn't fit to launcher in various languages
